name: JOMBLANG CAVE
description: 07.00 pm we’ll pick you up at the hotel and headed to Cave Jomblang - Gunung Kidul. Arriving at Cave Jomblang, preparation for caving and breffing. To go to the Cave Jomblang have to walk along 15 meters and continued with Caves Jomblang down with a rope length of 20 meters. Arriving at the bottom of the cave, there are many variety of plants that flourish . Continue heading to the "LUWENG   GRUBUNG" very famous Sunlight bursts in from Luweng Grubug as high as 90 meters form the pillar of light,  Shinning the beautiful flowstone and the depth of cave is pitch dark . Exotic beauty in a cave .......
